snippet: The new cases among gay and bisexual men in New York have been confirmed, health officials said, in an apparent revival of an outbreak that killed seven men in the city from 2010 to 2013.
abstract: New York City reports three new cases of meningitis among gay and bisexual men; health officials say cases are related to outbreak that killed seven men in the city from 2010 to 2013.
lead_paragraph: The new cases among gay and bisexual men in New York have been confirmed, health officials said, in an apparent revival of an outbreak that killed seven men in the city from 2010 to 2013.

headline.main: New York City Reports 3 New Cases of Meningitis
headline.print_headline: City Reports 3 New Cases of Meningitis
